title: Hands-on: Pela’s eco-friendly Pixel 6 cases ease the heartbreak of Google’s fabric cases
content:
With the launch of its Pixel 6 series, shoddy recreations, it’s a concept that hasn’t been replicated. But since its October launch, there’s one case that’s managed to ease the heartbreak felt from the loss of Google’s fabric cases — Pela’s soft and comfortable Pixel 6 cases.

more…

The post Hands-on: Pela’s eco-friendly Pixel 6 cases ease the heartbreak of Google’s fabric cases appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Where Google's fabric cases were a clear go-to for the Pixel lineup, Pela's Pixel 6 cases fill the gap of being soft and eco-friendly now.
